Ask HN: Is academia the opposite of self-employment since you have many bosses?
text:
In particular, the people involved in peer review of your work could be considered not just bosses but bosses who don't particularly care whether you succeed.

In fact, they may not even want you to succeed if your research threatens their research.

Ask HN: Private email relay for C2C communication?
text:
Craigslist has implemented this perfectly for years but I don't see a lot of other companies doing it. It makes a lot of sense that Craigslist doesn't need to filter / moderate messages between users as it just provides a way for them to communicate through email (mostly) anonymously.

Creating such an email relay seems non-trivial so I'm curious if there are any open source or even paid products that provide the same service. Does anyone know?
